rules_text:
Look at the top card of your library. If it's an artifact card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
Target player draws X cards and loses X life, where X is the number of artifacts you control.
You get an emblem with “Artifacts you control have ‘{T}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain that much life.'”
special_text:
[+2]: Look at the top card of your library. If it's an artifact card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
[-4]: Target player draws X cards and loses X life, where X is the number of artifacts you control.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Artifacts you control have ‘{T}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain that much life.'”
